title: News: Rust 1.26
description:
impl trait, match on references, Results from main, and more. A good way to mark three years since Rust 1.0!

Show Notes

  • Rust 1.26:
    • blog post
    • release notes
  • RFC #2115
  • The Rusty Spike
  • webassembly.studio
  • burntsushi’s now-1.0 crates:
    • regex
    • csv
    • docopt
  • Search crates VS Code plugin
